ingredients.ingredient: 2 ½ cups Macintosh apples - peeled, cored and quartered

cookingTips: Layer apples in the bottom of the Dutch oven
Mix oats, brown sugar, and flour with milk to create a thick topping
Bake covered in a Dutch oven to trap steam and keep apples moist
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a simplified crisp baked in a Dutch oven. Help the user understand the layers: apples on bottom, oat topping mixture spread over top.
